member.name: D2D1_THREADING_MODE
member.summary: Specifies the threading mode used while simultaneously creating the device, factory, and device context.

member.name: D2D1_THREADING_MODE.D2D1_THREADING_MODE_SINGLE_THREADED
member.summary: Resources may only be invoked serially. Device context state is not protected from multi-threaded access.

member.name: D2D1_THREADING_MODE.D2D1_THREADING_MODE_MULTI_THREADED
member.summary: Resources may be invoked from multiple threads. Resources use interlocked reference counting and their state is protected.
